data.title: Top 200 Love Songs for Him to Express Your Feelings
data.meta_description: You can use certain love songs for him to convey just how you feel towards your partner. Here are some of the best songs you can dedicate to your beloved.
data.meta_site_name: Marriage Advice - Expert Marriage Tips & Advice
data.text:
Listen to this article

When you really love someone, you want to find a way to show it, and sometimes lyrics can express your emotions way better than you can express them through words. It’s a sweet gesture that can go a long way.

There is something about love songs that melt the toughest of hearts and playing a romantic song for him is one way to discover his soft side. It’s also a great way of creating memories together.

Still trying to decide what love songs to send to him? If you need help on where to start, we’ve rounded up 100 choices you can send to your guy!

Top 200 love songs for him to express your feelings

The lyrics and music of great songs have the potential to make you feel true human emotions in a poignant and unique manner. They can help you understand your emotions better and deal with them in a healthier manner.

Certain couples decide on their personal song that holds special meaning for them. But Life Coach Jaclyn Hunt emphasizes,

A song that holds a deep meaning for the two of you is love song enough.

Here is a vast selection fo romantic songs for him that can musically express your feelings for your partner.

Romantic songs for him

Looking to inspire some romance in your relationship?

We have selected some of the best love songs for him that are sure to inspire romantic feelings. Whether you send one sweet song for him a day or a list of songs about being in love, we are sure he will enjoy listening to them.

You can even listen to these emotional love songs together. You should start with the songs that get you in your feelings, which can help you reconnect and enjoy the time together even more.

Thank God I Found You – Mariah Carey, Joe, and 98 Degrees

You Make Lovin’ Fun – Fleetwood Mac

I’ll Stand By You – Pretenders

Spanish Guitar – Toni Braxton

Wildest Dreams – Taylor Swift

When You Kiss Me – Shania Twain

Love Wins – Carrie Underwood

Worth It – Danielle Bradbery

Into You – Tamia and Fabolous

Crazy on You – Heart

Best I Ever Had – Vertical Horizon

Whole Lotta Love – Led Zeppelin

Morning Light – Justin Timberlake Ft. Alicia Keys

I Need You – Faith Hill & Tim McGraw

Keeper of the Stars – Tracy Byrd

Good love songs for him

If you are searching for love songs to send to your boyfriend, you are in the right place. We have prepared romantic love songs for him for you to choose from. How to choose the best love songs for a boyfriend?

Follow your heart and find the song that resembles your love story and your relationship the closest. Among many songs that express love, select the songs for him that show you know him and appreciate your love the way it is.

Fallin’ – Alicia Keys

Unconditionally – Kate Perry

First Time I Saw Your Face – Roberta Flack

Love Song – Adele

From This Moment – Shania Twain

Young and Beautiful – Lana Del Ray

Countdown – Beyonce

Thank God I Found You – Mariah Carey ft. Joe & 98 Degrees

Just a Kiss – Lady Antebellum

Take My Breath Away – Berlin

When I Said I Do – Lisa Hartman and Clint Black

My Baby Just Cares for Me – Nina Simone

Love On The Brain – Rihanna

Angel of Mine – Monica

In the Name of Love – Martin Garrix, Bebe Rexha

Songs to tell someone you love them

Finding new and inspiring ways to keep saying I love you is a challenging task. Therefore, take a peek at our selection of songs to express love and let the lyrics speak instead of you.

There are many songs to tell him you love him. Pick a love song for him that resonates with you the most at the moment.

Never Forget You – Zara Larsson and MNEK

I Keep On Lovin’ You – Reba McEntire

Thank You – Dido

Adore You – Miley Cyrus

You Got The Love – Florence and The Machine

No Air – Jordin Sparks ft. Chris Brown

I Will Always Love You – Dolly Parton

Endless Love – Diana Ross and Lionel Richie

All I Want Is You – U2

I’ll Always Love You – Taylor Dayne

Sweet Love – Anita Baker

I’m Yours – Alessia Cara

Love So Soft – Kelly Clarkson

Cute love songs for him

Many people wonder how to express their feelings to a man. We ask you, “Have you, so far, sent any love songs to him?”

Songs about true love have been written by some of the best songwriters and inspired by true love and hardship. So it is not surprising that true love songs for him can sometimes speak about what you feel amazingly well.

The Promise – Tracy Chapman

All the Love in the World – The Corrs

I Love You Always and Forever – Donna Lewis

Because You Loved Me – Celine Dion

Will You Love Me Tomorrow – Carole King

When You Say Nothing At All – Alison Krauss

The Best – Bonnie Tyler

When I Close My Eyes – Shanice

You Belong With Me – Taylor Swift

Here With Me – Dido

Vision of Love – Mariah Carey

The Way I Am – Ingrid Michaelson

You Were Meant For Me – Jewel

I Wanna Know What Love Is – Foreigner

Come Away With Me – Norah Jones

Tell Me You Love Me – Demi Lovato

Where Have You Been – Rihanna

Ashes – Celine Dion

Naked – James Arthur

Already Taken – Trey Songz

Related Reading: 85 Love Paragraphs for Him to Cherish

Best love songs from her to him

Life Coach Jaclyn Hunt looks at what is truly romantic and points out,

I always imagine that commercial where two people are rocking out to a song in a dingy apartment, on vacation or in a house they worked years to save for and in all those circumstances, that is a love song.

Do you have a song as a couple? You could start by finding songs to dedicate to your boyfriend.

He might reciprocate, and before you know it, one of those falling in love songs will be yours. If not, we are sure you will at least make him miss you.

I’m Yours – Justine Skye

You Light Up My Life – Debby Boone

Woman in Love – Barbara Streisand

What a Feeling – Irene Cara

Killing Me Softly With His Song – Roberta Flack

I Was Made For Loving You – Tori Kelly and Ed Sheeran

Time After Time – Cyndi Lauper

Morning Train – Sheena Easton

Diamonds – Rihanna

Truly Madly Deeply – Savage Garden

Songs about unconditional love

With so many love songs for men, it can be hard to narrow down. Which one to choose from all those falling in love songs for him? We have selected some of the best romantic songs for him, along with a short description that can help your selection process.

Deep love songs for him

When looking for songs to help convey how you feel towards your partner, you can pick the love songs lyrics for him that are apt and poetic. Let the lyrics work to your advantage and help your partner understand your love better.

The Power of Love – Jennifer Rush

Love songs for your man

Couples therapy often tries to motivate couples to do small things for each other to reenergise the relationship. Dedicating a love song can make him feel extra special and valued by you.

Lovers – Taylor Swift

Bleeding Love – Leona Lewis

Related Reading: 100 Best Love Memes for Him

Country songs to tell him how you feel

Life Coach Jaclyn Hunt highlights,

When you feel nostalgic and get transported back in time with your love on your mind or in your fantasy, that’s how you know that love song runs deep.

Country songs often convey meaning in a heartfelt manner. You can use these songs to communicate with your partner and tell him how much you love him.

Breathe – Faith Hill

In Case You Didn’t Know – Brett Young

Just a Kiss – Lady A

I Hate Love Songs – Kelsea Ballerini

Tennessee Orange – Megan Moroney

Holding On to You – Miranda Lambert

She’s in Love With The Boy – Trisha Yearwood

Pick Me Up – Gabby Barrett

Only You can Love Me This Way – Keith Urban

Show Me Heaven – Tina Arena

When I Look At You – Miley Cyrus

I’m Gonna Love You Through It – Martina McBride

I Need You – LeAnn Rimes

Bubbly – Colbie Caillat

Every Little Thing – Carly Pearce

Classic love songs about him

You can never go wrong with things that are classic. Classic songs can invoke nostalgia and put a person in the right mood

I have Nothing – Whitney Houston

You Make Me Feel Like a Natural Woman – Aretha Franklin

My Heart Will Go On – Celine Dion

If I Ain’t Got You – Alicia Keys

Love songs for him in 2023

You can also surprise your partner with some meaningful songs that are romantic and currently on the chart.

Lavender Haze- Taylor Swift

Made You Look – Meghan Trainor

Cardigan – Taylor Swift

Don’t Go Yet – Camilla Cabello

This is What Falling in Love Feels Like – JVKE

Final takeaway

There are many ways to make your man feel special and surprise him. Carefully selecting and sending love songs for him is a great way to do that.

Music brings out the emotional side of us and allows them to surface. If you want to warm his heart and make him miss you choose and send some love songs for him.

These love songs for him will help you express your feelings to your man with ease. If you are not good with words, dedicate one of the songs in the list to your SO and make him feel great about the special.
